description: recto: profile of the heads of two older men both wearing glasses; verso: red and green stamps and typewritten text
inscription: LLC of sheet in red pencil, on verso: 58
markings: UL of sheet stamped in red ink, on verso: MARSYAS / REDAKTION: THEODOR TAGGER / BERLIN W [remainder of address crossed out] | UL of sheet stamped in green ink, on verso: [illegible] Berlin-Wilmersdorf / [illegible] 41.
title: Sketch of Two Heads
